about.title: About Me
about.content:
I am {{ age }} years old, and I love web development. Iâ€™ve been programming for {{ experience }} years and started by making games in Roblox, and from there I progressed to building more complex things.

Apart from that, I am currently in the accelerated program for web development at the Grafisch Lyceum Utrecht.

detail.0:
For an elective assignment at school, I chose to build an x86_64 bootloader.

Learning the language was a challenge, but I enjoyed learning more about low-level programming.
detail.1:
For this school project, I built a website in a group of four people, where we used Vue and TailwindCSS for styling.

We had to rebuild both the Focus6 website and the Spiegelspel website, and I mainly worked on the Focus6 website.
detail.2:
For a school assignment, I chose to create a shared document that users can edit, and where another user sees the changes immediately.

I used sockets for this, built the front end in Vue, and the back end in VLang with Redis as the database.
